name: I Am a Rock (itch)
description:
Imagine yourself, waking up in the morning, looking at a mirror and seeing yourself as a rock. That's exactly what happens with you in there.

Right now I have only worked on this game for a day. Yes, I am alone, if someone wants to join, then give me a message. Thank you. 

The game is a 3D game. You have to roll around levels, finish puzzles on so on. I started this project because of the game jam "A Game By Its cover 2017".
